howB: L.A is the sports channel of your life, your new world finally exists!
how2: There are more than 30 modalities in L.A
how3: Choose the one you want and enjoy it!
how5: Each modality has rankings of full games or challenges
how6: Choose what you want and shoot with your friends!
how7: ALL THE MATCHES SHOULD BE FILMED, ALWAYS.
how9: Create a Youtube account and upload your video
how10: Label your video with the name of the game
how11: SHOULD CREATE A CHANNEL ON YOUTUBE.
how13: Contact us and send the link to your video
how14: Now just wait 2 days to get in the World Ranking
how15: THE DEFEATED ADVERSARY MUST GUARANTEE THAT THE VICTORIOUS DOES NOT LIE ABOUT THE RESULTS OF THE GAME.
how17: There will be rankings every three months to be played and everyone will enjoy the overall world ranking
how18: Chat right now with L.A TEAM in messenger to send us your videos and your doubts
how19: THE ATHLETE OR TIME LYING ON A MATCH OR LYING ABOUT NOT BE PROFESSIONAL, WILL BE DISQUALIFIED FROM THE WORLD RANKING.
how23: L.A are at your disposal Athletes from all over the World.
